topdown

Class Wall

  • java.lang.Object
    • topdown.GameObject
      • topdown.Wall

  • public class Wall
extends GameObject
    Creates a wall to be used as a way to block movement in-game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Isaac Jimenez, Nicholas English, Suman Gurung

    • Constructor Summary
